segments.text: Do you have any sales experience ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I worked in a fashion shop as a part time salesgirl .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What kind of work are you doing now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm working as an export sales staff member for a trade company .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I work at Yangshi Trade Company Ltd . I have been working there since 1997 .
segments.speaker: S2
